title: A map of The Dave
name: A map of The Dave
description:
A Map by Maverixxx

places that i will never forget

properties.name: 30 city rd
properties.description: Posted by Tallulahbellin the ghetto, we had some great parties here, my boy also moved in with me here - the rest are places we\'ve lived together

properties.name: BS8
properties.description: Posted by MaverixxxTalulahbell and i had a shop here called Nada, sold t-shirts with slogans. Unfortunately it was before people wore that kinda thing. My fave was the "tiny penis" one

properties.name: Bierkeller
properties.description: Posted by MaverixxxWhatever happened to Anders Frappel? worked as assistant manager here before running away with some kinky chick. You may know her as Tallulahbell

properties.name: Centre for Alternative Technology
properties.description: Posted by Maverixxx  great place full of ideas for living in a more responsible way. Dont bother with Eden go here.

properties.name: Garstons
properties.description: Posted by MaverixxxBoy works as activity instructor, girl goes on activity holiday friday, boy meets girl saturday next weekend boy moves in with girl. Few months after that boy moves out..... Me impulsive?..!

properties.name: Judiths Flat
properties.description: Posted by MaverixxxThe infamous Judith, now there is a woman who will go down in history. If I could take back what she took, Id probably not cos that experience will be a tale I will tell untill im buried.

properties.name: Lions Mills
properties.description: Posted by MaverixxxThe parties I had here will forever be the stuff of legends. living the dream ;)

properties.name: Maverix
properties.description: Posted by MaverixxxMy HouseEvery journey starts from here

properties.name: Old Church
properties.description: Posted by MaverixxxSpent about 6 moths here under the illusion I might get some work ? ? ? Flooded a friends house on christmas eve :-/ made some friends only to lose touch again. did a bit of climbing, lots of walking and absoloutley no work whatsoever

properties.name: Second Skin
properties.description: Posted by Maverixxx My favourite wetsuits, toasty warm all through the winter. And a cracking selection of Longboards, but dont expect any amazing bargains.

properties.name: Skern Lodge
properties.description: Posted by MaverixxxLots of shenanigans, lots of fun and then I ran off with some bint to Brizzul ! WTF was that about?

properties.name: Spank
properties.description: Posted by MaverixxxThis is exactly where i met Talulahbell some 12 years ago :)

properties.name: The last place I lived alone
properties.description: Posted by MaverixxxThis was where I lived before I met K then got into a scrap with the coke head guy I lived with. K said i could stay at hers till i found somewhere to live. Guess I never did find a new place ;)
